title: I gifted my friend at the same time he bought something.
body: I gifted my friend xCREEDKILERx Championship Thresh at the same time that he bought the skin and it took both of our Rp from the purchase . Is there any way to resolve this problem and get at least one of us our money back? And no neither of us have refunds left.

replies.body:
Hey there!

Wow this seems like a really unique problem to have! Unfortunately, I don't have an answer for you, but perhaps Riot's support team will. Be sure to have your friend [open a support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) and include as much information about the issue as possible!
Damn you Elduris!  Posted in the middle of my reply!!!  ***shakes fist!!!***

> Damn you Elduris!  Posted in the middle of my reply!!!  ***shakes fist!!!***

Ahaha is it odd that I was reading this while drinking a nice glass of h20 and spit it out like a Pokemon? =o

Hey Oreo8349!

When I read your post, I immediately went ahead and checked your friend's account.  All I could say was "WOW!", the odds of this happening almost at the exact second is extremely rare and has to be incredibly crazy.

Because you gifted Championship Thresh to your friend, I went ahead and manually refunded the 975 RP that he spent on this skin.  Let him know that he should see this added back the next time he signs in!
